;Generated by Great Cow Graphical BASIC

;Chip Settings

;Include files (Libraries)
#include <eracer.h>

;Defines (Constants)
#define Difference 5

;Main Routine
set green on
set red on
Main:
Left = ReadAD(Analog_LDR_Left)
Right = ReadAD(Analog_LDR_Right)
Forward
if Left < (Right+Difference) then
 TurnLeft
end if
if Left > (Right-Difference) then
 TurnRight
end if
goto Main
